English: I was trying to reach you.
Do you have any more of those?
I don't see much of him.
I'm going to see them again.
I am talking about my brother.
He isn't going to buy any {{c::bread}}.
Tom has just finished eating dinner.
This is not going to work.
He didn't take an {{c::umbrella}} with him.

French: Je n'apprécie pas l'humour de tom.
